parameters.name: Reversed
parameters.description: True creates a constant-pitch helix or spiral in the opposite direction of the circle used to define the diameter, false creates a constant-pitch helix or spiral in the direction of the circle's normal vector; the normal vector of a circle, for example, would be off the screen if the circle were drawn in a counter-clockwise direction

parameters.name: Clockwised
parameters.description: True for clockwise, false for counter-clockwise

parameters.name: Tapered
parameters.description: True to taper the constant-pitch helix, false for no taper

parameters.name: Outward
parameters.description: True to taper the constant-pitch helix outward, false for inward

parameters.name: Helixdef
parameters.description: Constant-pitch helix or spiral definition as defined by swHelixDefinedBy_e

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Height of constant-pitch helix in meters

parameters.name: Pitch
parameters.description: Constant-pitch helix or spiral pitch

parameters.name: Revolution
parameters.description: Number of revolutions

parameters.name: TaperAngle
parameters.description: Taper angle of constant-pitch helix

parameters.name: Startangle
parameters.description: Start angle rotation from base axis in radians

title: IModelDoc2.InsertHelix
description: Creates a constant-pitch helix or spiral.
signature:
void InsertHelix( 
   System.Boolean
Reversed
,
   System.Boolean
Clockwised
,
   System.Boolean
Tapered
,
   System.Boolean
Outward
,
   System.Int32
Helixdef
,
   System.Double
Height
,
   System.Double
Pitch
,
   System.Double
Revolution
,
   System.Double
TaperAngle
,
   System.Double
Startangle
)

parameters.name: Reversed
parameters.description: True creates a constant-pitch helix or spiral in the opposite direction of the circle used to define the diameter, false creates a constant-pitch helix or spiral in the direction of the circle's normal vector; the normal vector of a circle, for example, would be off the screen if the circle were drawn in a counter-clockwise direction

parameters.name: Clockwised
parameters.description: True for clockwise, false for counter-clockwise

parameters.name: Tapered
parameters.description: True to taper the constant-pitch helix, false for no taper

parameters.name: Outward
parameters.description: True to taper the constant-pitch helix outward, false for inward

parameters.name: Helixdef
parameters.description: Constant-pitch helix or spiral definition as defined by swHelixDefinedBy_e

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Height of constant-pitch helix in meters

parameters.name: Pitch
parameters.description: Constant-pitch helix or spiral pitch

parameters.name: Revolution
parameters.description: Number of revolutions

parameters.name: TaperAngle
parameters.description: Taper angle of constant-pitch helix

parameters.name: Startangle
parameters.description: Start angle rotation from base axis in radians

remarks: When creating a a spiral, you must specify the pitch and number of revolutions.
